DataElement.preferredName: Equipment Completed Daily Quality Control Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response of Yes or No to indicate if the daily quality assurance techniques and activities were performed on the  diagnostic, therapeutic, and/or research equipment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Occurring or done each day._Set of measurements and inspections taken to verify that performance of equipment and procedures remains within specified limits.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Occurring or done each day.:The operational techniques and activities undertaken within the quality assurance system to verify that the requirements for quality of the trial related activities have been fulfilled. [ICH]

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Set of measurements and inspections taken to verify that performance of equipment and procedures remains within specified limits.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/7/13 DEC released. jc 10/4/13 created post Rnd 4 community comments; superceded DEC 2717569 - generalized to Equipment. jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
